It is characterized by its unique morphology, featuring delicate, often bioluminescent petals that emit a faint glow at night. The plant's leaves are broad and heart-shaped, with a waxy surface that aids in water retention. Its flowers bloom in clusters, producing a subtle, sweet fragrance that attracts nocturnal pollinators. Due to its endangered status, conservation efforts are underway to protect this enigmatic species from habitat loss.
